author: Morgan Winsor, Emily Shapiro, Nadine El-Bawab, Ivan Pereira, Julia Jacobo, Meredith Deliso, Bill Hutchinson, Kevin Shalvey, Celia Darrough
title: Russia-Ukraine live updates: Zelenskyy demands release of kidnapped Ukrainian mayor
description:
1. Russia-Ukraine live updates: Zelenskyy demands release of kidnapped Ukrainian mayor  ABC News
  2. Russian offensive widens as US imposes new trade sanctions  WTVR CBS 6
  3. Ukraine-Russia War News: Live Updates  The New York Times
content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy Saturday demanded the release of Melitopol Mayor Roman Fedorov, who Ukrainian officials allege was kidnapped by Russian forces.
